name: autohide the menu & sidebar [Fox Business]
description:
Hides the Fox <s>News</s> Business header, footer, and sidebar. (But not permanently - hover at the edges of the screen to restore them.) Moves the superfluous photo to the end of the article, and moves the Print toolbox to the right. Now it resembles news again.

"<s>FoxNews</s> FoxBusiness: Almost news and fit to print"
additional_info:
The fuzzy gray strips at the top, bottom, and left edges of the screen are the collapsed header, footer, and sidebar, respectively. Mouse over a strip to restore the element.

I guessed at the height of the superfluous image. If you find a larger image that obscures the text, give me the page URL and I'll provide more room. 

Currently this is simply a copy of style 92642. The sites are almost identical, but not completely identical, so I'll tart this one up shortly.
